comments:
Hi,
   I get the following error when I create a webservice.  I am in the step 1 of the project wizard where I click on Web Service and click Next button.

Thanks,
Gaja


IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.

I'm just changing component to be more specfic. 

But ... was this found on 1.0.0? Or an M-build, or and I-build? 

Thanks.

Duplicate of bug 119111. This exception occurs when there are no configured servers in the workbench. The workaround is to create at least one server via Preferences - Server - Installed Runtimes.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 119111 ***

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old is is assumed its dup, invalid, or worksforme resolution is no longer in qustion and the bugzilla needs no further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error in this case.
